Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/77th
ShortDescription: #8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

Allow extra travel time.
